评论详情: Pretty dress, beautiful green. Velvet makes it a bit heavy. I wanted to love it, but the dress was not flattering for my body type.

It said this was a dark red dress, and every picture shows that it is, but what I received is bright red and looks incredibly cheap. It looks like a cheap stuffed animal that you would win at a carnival and not at all like an elegant dress. I’m not sure how other people got something that looks like the picture, but this is garbage. The color looks like a cheap Santa costume.
needed a dress suitable for a winter wedding.  this dress fit well, was comfortable, decent quality and actually looked brand new after a wash on the delicate cycle.

I’m 5’3 and curvy. This fits so flattering, love the velvet navy color and material. I’ll be wearing it without the belt. Since I’m so short, the size large is hitting below my knee, but still good for a winter cruise

评论概述: Covered in someone else's hair - disgusting!
评论详情: The dress itself looked nice, but the dress and attachable belt were COVERED in someone else's short, blonde hair. It literally looked like someone trimmed their hair and threw the dress on top of the cuttings. So gross.

评论概述: Nice soft fabric and attractive styling
评论详情: I bought this for a Christmas party. I got a size small and it seemed like it was going to fit too small but once zipped it fit fine and it was very attractive. Dressy yet comfortable. The color was beautiful. I highly recommend it.

评论概述: Really pretty color but it ran large
评论详情: I loved the color of the dress, but it was way too big. I ordered a small but it fit more like a medium.  I also think I received a used dress because it smelled like body odor. If it was new and clean I probably would’ve gotten it tailored so I could wear it, but I was so turned off by the smell that I had to return it.
The fabric is very soft and comfortable, with just a bit of stretch so it’s easy to move in. The color is very rich.
I wore this dress for our Christmas pictures, it’s light and well made, soft.
This fit true to size and perfect for a December wedding
Loved the dress! The color was beautiful! I’m 5ft 160 lbs and ordered a large! I wore heels and it feel well!

This dress was all about the rich color. Easy to wear, very stretchy and forgiving. Facing in front top however left a line on chest but it didn't seem as noticeable in person. No special undies or smoothers worn in these photos. True to size

Prefect color for our holiday cards, the color was exactly as the photos on the listing. The fit was also true to size, I had to size up 2 sizes because of my chest, and it fit perfectly. I just cinched in the waist with the included velvet rope/belt. Also surprised by the fabric quality, thicker velvet and not cheap feeling at all

评论概述: Not the best material.  Thin feeling
评论详情: Not the dress for me, material was not flattering and felt thin.  Color was nice tho.
This was a great value for the money! Soft, stretchy material and a great color for our Christmas  pictures.
The cute at the chest is odd and was not symmetrical. Additionally, the dress did not have the bow featured in the product image. Color was beautiful but not worth the price tag.

The color was just as in the website picture.  Good quality for the price. Usually A-line dresses fit me really well.  Unfortunately the fabric gave more of a bodycon fit and stuck to my backside curves (I was trying to avoid that). I think if the fabric was heavier it might have hung better on me. But beautiful rich Burgundy color.

The size and fit are excellent! The velvet is quite stretchy so the bodice flatters while the full skirt flows beautifully.  I paired the dress with a gold and burgundy pashmina and got so many compliments.  The only con was that I wasn't really sure what to do with the bow/belt. I am plus size so this might not be an issue for a more slender build. It is sewn on and for my size it isn't long enough to be a belt, but it's a bit long and narrow to tie to the side. It wasn't bad enough to mitigate my delight, but I would've liked it to be a little longer and thicker.
Fit beautifully! Very forgiving. Great purchase!!

Bought this dress did a late Nov. wedding. It was perfect. Comfortable and lots of stretch. Waist really accentuates my figure. This will also be a great dress for holiday parties. I received a lot of complements. I’m 5’10 and 260lbs wearing a 2XL

Beautiful dress. Great fit and length. I’m looking forward to wearing this to my niece’s wedding next month, but I can also wear it “anywhere “ after that. I appreciate the great quality in all of the clothes I buy from Amazon; not one has been wrinkled or dirty or missing buttons, etc. Thank you to the packing department, they do a very nice job!

Velvet and soft. Great quality! It fit like a glove and helped provide the hour glass figure. The neckline was a little low cut if you're voluptuous, but not horrible unless you take a selfie. Overall the dress helped boost my confidence and allowed me to feel sexy.
Accurate sizing. Thick fabric and nice quality for the price. Perfect for our holiday photos.

The velvet is very thin and the lining on the V neck wouldn't stay tucked under just while trying on.  I bought two different dresses in dark blue and thought I would like this one better but because of the thin fabric and awkward lining - I returned this one!

This dress is lovely. The quality of the fabric and seams exceeded my expectations. It flows nicely, smooting the figure and highlighting the curves in the best way.  Now, the sizing is definitely off to the larger side. I am 5'4", 130lbs, and I got size M (both recommended to me by Amazon by the numbers on sizing sheet). The dress is way too big for me in the shoulders, bust, waist, and hips - so technically, everywhere :) I am going to try and reorder it in S and see what happens there.
Love this dress and got a ton of compliments.  Fit true to size and just how I wanted it.  Only downside is dry clean only - but this one is worth it.  The teal color was gorgeous.
Looked much more like a forest green in the photo but it was too bright. Looked ok but decided not to wear. I should have returned it.
THe dress was exactly as I expected. I will be wearing it for my birthday celebration.

The material is solid, yet lightweight. It's incredibly flattering,  very comfortable, and worth every penny.  I'm glad I sized down to an XL, because it is a little stretchier than I anticipated and I love it.
Made way better than I thought it would be. Wore to a 1920s style wedding in the cold . It was perfect
Very nice
Nothing beats being comfortable and beautiful and this dress does just that! It was a tad bit longer on be because I am short but it still looked amazing

I wasn't sure how I would like a velvet dress, but this is a stunner!  I am on the heavier side, have a decent size tummy and am busty, and this dress concealed the parts that needed to be hidden and accentuated the better parts.  It is very elegant.  It hits just past the knee, which in my opinion makes it more elegant.
I get it... I don't have the most form-fitting shape, but I was really hoping this would help!
Wedding

I bought this dress for a Valentines photo shoot and it was perfect! Thin enough not to overheat, but still a good quality material that you can’t see through! Fully lined. I added a cami because it was too low cut for me but this would be perfect for any occasion. Fits true to size
This was an amazing dress that got lots of compliments this Christmas season.
It's perfect in every way.  Exactly what I needed for a winter wedding.
Easy to wear and dressy
This dress is beautiful, feels great and fits perfect.  I plan to order in the non-velvet option.

This is a great winter dress for the holidays or winter wedding. I loved the color and feel of this dress. it was comfortable and liked the sleeve length too. Sadly I sent it back as I found a better dress for the occasion I was shopping for.

Bought this for 2 holiday parties and it was perfect! It hung nicely, didn’t wrinkle, has some stretch, and covered my muffin top. It’s a simple black dress that can be dressed up or down but being velvet is perfect for the holidays!
Very soft, very comfortable, a bit on the short side. You have to tie the sash just right for it to look like it belongs.

This dress is great! It looks fancy enough to be worn to a formal event, it's comfortable to be in for hours, and it's easy to put on. The velvet is very nice to touch, and it adds a bit of class to it. When dancing, the dress also swirls around your legs in a fashion that reminds me of those old dancing movies. Honestly, this is a dress that will make you feel beautiful.

I needed a dress to wear to my dad's funeral. This was beautiful easy to take care of simple and it's a great little black dress that you need for any kind of occasion. True to size washes well. Received many compliments on it!

This dress was well made, comfortable and had lots of give without being baggy or too tight. I bought the xl, since I have broad shoulders and often the sleeves won’t fit on a large. I wear a 12 in most cases and this was perfect. Pictures with the family turned out beautifully!
Great dress for the holidays.  Comfortable and wrinkles fell out easily after hanging up out of package.  I like the mix of style and a bit more conservative, will work to wear to church.
Beautiful dress!  The fabric is rich in color and nice weight.  Fits true to size.

评论概述: Beautiful color, perfect for winter wedding
评论详情: Size is spot on, color is gorgeous. Bought this for a Christmas wedding. Cannot wait to wear it.

评论概述: Pay attention to the sizing chart!
评论详情: This dress was exactly what I was looking for! Make sure you pay attention to the waist sizing, that’s the most important part of the measurements. Classy length and perfect for a winter evening out!

评论概述: nice velvet but returned due to sizeing being off
评论详情: I ordered two of these dresses.. the violet in S and the Black in S, both ran large the Violet was damaged in the front of the dress. wanted to love thm since it was soft and stretchy, Returned both due to sizing

评论概述: Flattering fit, comfortable and well made
评论详情: I plan to wear this dress for dressy holiday events. The color and fit are very nice

Always on the lookout for simple yet versatile black dresses, I was hopeful that this would be useful for me. While not the most stylish of dresses, it could be useful for those of us who aren't looking for "fast fashion." I was surprised by how heavy the dress actually is, but of course with velvet and the satiny liner, that actually shouldn't be surprising. I appreciate the 3/4 sleeve; full-length sleeves are so often difficult to fit into a coat. I also like that belt is not attached, so the dress can be worn with or without. Unable to reach the zipper in the back, I did have to ask a family member for help zipping it, which led to the question "Are you dressing like a pilgrim for something?" So be aware that you, too, may be looking like a pilgrim in this! (I work in a school, so it's actually not unheard of for me to dress like a pilgrim...but, still....!)

Really pretty dress.  Classic emerald green.  Very flattering fit and came with a matching belt.  Three quarter sleeves (although it says long sleeves they are not)  and it comes down past my knees so this is good for fall or winter.  Planning on wearing it to a Christmas concert.  Very comfortable and stylish.  I would recommend it.

This is exactly my wife's style and while I knew I had to pick one the hardest part was knowing which of the great colors to pick.  One of the standout features of this dress is its luxurious velvet fabric. It's soft on the skin while looking very classic and elegant. The v-neckline is tastefully revealing, striking that perfect balance between modesty and allure.  The dress's fit is true to its description – an exceptional feat in the world of online shopping. It offers a fitting silhouette that's flattering to different body types. The bow belt is also fashionable and functional. While it looks stunning in its original form, the fact that it can be modified for various fashion statements adds a touch of versatility to an already versatile dress. Whether you're aiming for a classic, vintage look, or seeking to infuse a dash of contemporary flair, the bow belt allows for that personal touch.  Perfect for formal events, cocktail parties, weddings, or church functions. In a world where fast fashion often compromises on quality, the Velvet Vintage Tea Dress was a hit, and brownie points were awarded. Highly recommended!

Okay okay. But in all honestly this green velvet is absolutely gorgeous!!!! The color is very true to the picture and it is perfect for the Christmas holidays.  It is very flattering, however my only complaint is I normally wear a XL/14 but bought up for length. The XXL was snug. More snug then it should of been so I recommend sizing up. There is also no loops for the belt. So if you don’t have a waist, sorry your belt won’t stay up much.  Otherwise it is gorgeous, thick fabric, made well and super comfortable.
Very flattering, made well, fits as expected, and feels nice. I’ll definitely be wearing it for the holidays.

I got this dress in burgundy and in grape for a wedding rehearsal and wedding ceremony. They are super flattering, have nice stretch to them (but aren't baggy). The fit is very true to size. I like that the bow is detachable, but also like that there's some variety in how you can customize the dress. The length of the dress is about tea-length on me, and I am 6ft.  Very nice quality, feels great, would order from this company again!
Sta bene addosso Taglia corrisponde
I liked it. Wasexactly as described and met my expectations. Good value

This is a very elegant dress value for money the velvet green colour is amazing and the fabric feels expensive. It is true to its size but you have to absolutely consult the size guide. I am 165 cm and 64 kg and size M fits perfectly
Bellissimo vestito, elegante e comodo!
Arrivato in anticipo sulla data di consegna, un po' abbondante rispetto alle misure dichiarate ma veste bene
Bello. Morbido. Bel colore. Veste giusto. Lieve difetto si attoecigliano le maniche a tre quarti.
Veste benissimo. Taglia perfetta
Molto confortevole
C’est parfait pour New Year’s Eve festivities

Ich habe das Kleid in dunkelrotem Samt bestellt und es ist wirklich wunderschön! Angenehm zu tragen, macht eine schöne Figur und es sieht super weihnachtlich aus ❤️ ein einziger Kritikpunkt ist, dass Laschen für den „Gürtel“ fehlen. Aber den kann man einfach annähen wenn man möchte :)
Belle qualité mais la couleur turquoise ne me plaît pas et en plus, il manque la ceinture
Sehr schönes Kleid..Besser als gedacht..

Franchement j ai été agréablement surprise : le bleu est bien bleu nuit comme sur le modèle, élastique , beau tombé  pas trop longue et pas trop courte. Avec une ceinture couleur  or et bijoux cela fait très chic . Je fais un 44/46 j’ai  2xxl et je suis très à l’aise et le décolleté est très bien pour une femme mature. Je vais pouvoir passer un beau réveillon sans être  serrée dans ma robe !!

Das Kleid ist wirklich wunderschön, auch die Qualität ist einwandfrei! Es sitzt perfekt, hat auch eine tolle Länge (geht etwas übers Knie), auch die Farbe ("turquoise") ist klasse! (Ich hatte XL bestellt, meine Größe: 175 cm bei 70 kg.) Das Kleid ist dehnbar und sitzt bequem, alles in allem ein Volltreffer, auch wenn es in der Tat etwas "altbacken" wirkt....es geht dennoch zurück, da es mir für eine Hochzeit (als Gast) im Mai einfach zu dunkel ist...schade, dass es keine helleren Farben gibt!
Pretty emerald green velvet. Loose fit which, made figure fitting by belt. I washed it in cold water on delicate setting, hung it to dry and it did not need ironing. I recommend.
Je l’ai achetée en plusieurs couleurs. Seyante, simple à laver, pas de repassage, l’ideal
Ich brauchte ein Winterkleid für die Opera, aber ich wollte nicht so viel ausgeben. Das Kleid passt gut und macht eine gute Figur.
Schönes Kleid für jeden Anlass
Preis/Leistung okay. Größe wie erwartet. Fester Stoff.
Der Stoff ist schön, aber der Schnitt sieht echt altbacken aus
Das Kleid sieht nicht gut aus und keine gute Qualität

J’ai retourné la robe car je me suis trompé de la taille. Comme matière et comme qualité ce n’est pas au top mais ça va. Je l’ai pris pour le Noel. Dommage que j’ai pas pris la bonne taille. Je fait 1m60 et 72 kg. La taille L était trop large et un peu longue.

Leider war dieses Kleid nicht so wie ich es mir vorgestellt habe. Das Oberteil hatte an den Seiten unschöne Nähte die sehr unvorteilhaft aussahen und es sehr billig wirken ließ. Da die Schleife gefehlt hat, gab mir das Kleid keine Taille und hing nur an mir herunter.
Compré el vestido de terciopelo azul 3XL es talla 48 aprox. . No transparenta nada, el patrón se acopla muy bien porque es un poco elástico y el largo es muy elegante.
Sehr hübsch, gute Passform

trés satisfait de son look..bien coupée et très joli velours (je l'ai acheté en bleu marine) je fais du 38/40 normalement et j'ai pris la tailleM ...qui correspond ..je la trouve juste un peu trop longue..mais ,cela peut etre un détail car très souvent on doit faire des ourlets ..fermeture éclair au dos,un peu trop fine.. est vraiment très chic comme sur la présentation.. livraison date prèvue,rapide
Ich habe es zu Weihnachten bestellt,aber es passte nicht.
Cette robe correspond parfaitement à la description elle est suffisamment chaude et de la bonne longueur.

I received so many compliments from seniors and young people too! I told everyone that it was an Amazon Special!! And they laughed and were shocked! I love the dress and how it made me feel. I want to go out dancing again!!

Habe es für eine Winter Hochzeit gekauft. Habe viele Komplimente für das Kleid bekommen. Für mich hätte es eventuell etwas kürzer sein können. Bin 1,64 m groß und das Kleid geht mir über das Knie. Aber hat mich nicht gestört. Qualität ist super und es legt sich auch nicht an die Strumpfhose an. Freue mich wenn ich es bald wieder tragen kann.
fällt schön, trägt sich leicht

Ein so schönes Kleid und eine grandiose Farbe. Leider habe ich mich von den Empfehlungen und der Größentabelle verleiten lassen, es eine Nummer größer in XL zu bestellen. Damit war es jetzt viel zu groß und ich musste es wieder zurück senden. Nun gibt es das Kleid nicht mehr in L und da bin ich sehr traurig darüber.
Sehr schön, tolle Qualität , m passt ganz genau( 167 cm, 65 kg)
Pour un repas sur le thème de noel
Habe das Kleid für eine Gala bestellt und war positiv überrascht. Es passt perfekt bei Körpergröße 165 und 83 KG. Sehr zu empfehlen. Trägt sich ausgesprochen gut, ist leicht und  elegant.
Ansich ein schönes Kleid, der Stoff fällt locker und es scheint gut verarbeitet. Aber als Abendkleid finde ich es nicht geeignet, da die Nähte unschön wirken, deshalb einen Punkt Abzug.
Die passte wow gegossen
Das samtkleid meine Erwartungen erfüllt es sieht toll aus und war die richtige Größe!  Ea fühlt sich gut an beim tragen!
Schönes Kleid,  paßt perfekt Größe 36 ( Gewicht 53kg, 158 Größe)

Für unsere Weihnachtsfeier habe ich ein festliches grünes Kleid gesucht. Und hiermit gefunden. Ich trage die Größe 46 undhabbe mit 3xl die richtige Wahl getroffen. Ich bin 168 cm groß es scheint mir etwas zu lang (Wadenmitte) ob ich es kürze überlege ich mir noch. Der Stoff ist super angenehm zu tragen und wirkt hochwertig. Der V Ausschnitt sitzt perfekt und das grün ist wie auf den Bildern zu sehen.
Alles perfekt!
